name: Bastion (itch) (SwaritChoudhari)
description:
Bastion is a PvP Shooter game with many maps and gamemodes to choose from! Best played with two and highly recommended to settle arguments! Bastions shooting controls may be a little bit hard to begin with but, once you have played it many times, you will start to get the hang of it! Bastion was made for Tropicon 2022 Game Jam!

Made by 18 and under indie game dev! Not revealing age tho...

Status - IN DEVELOPMENT (early access)

Controls:

  • Player 1:
    • [W] to jump
    • [A] to move towards the left
    • [D] to move towards the right
    • [E] to shoot at the enemy (player 2) and auto aim is there so just spam it! 
  • Player 2:
    • [⬆] to jump
    • [⬅] to move towards the left
    • [➡] to move towards the right
    • [L] to shoot at the enemy (player 1) and auto aim is there so just spam it!

Maps currently available:

  • Tokyo Lights
  • Beach Bash
  • Jungle Feud

Technologies used:

  • Godot
  • Discord (what??? i need to get a awesome music maker somewhere...)
  • Pixilart (awesome pixel art tool)
